system.description:
An archer that practices patience and the styles of the Soft Riverine to fire extremely precise attacks at targets. They align themselves with the Tranquil Way to make sure their attacks always hit.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Whistling Arrow. Attack an enemy in range 10 with Faith, skewering if the target is 6+ tiles away.

Gambits [[/r d10]]

1-3: Rush > Rush > Inflict Violence

4-6: Rush > Inflict Violence > Deadshot [1]: Inflict 1 Hit on any 1 enemy in the battlefield with full HP. If none, then 1 Hit on any 1 enemy instead.

7-9: Rush > Meridian Arrow [2]: Attack up to 2 different fighters in range 5 with Bravery, slowing them.

10: Wo Long Arrow [3]: Attack all enemies in range 6 burst 2 with Bravery + Faith, dazzling.

traits.name: Conviction
traits.description: All Folk have a reason for fighting, and if reasoned to, can cause them to rethink combat. However, they will fight for their Conviction until it looks like all is bleak.

traits.name: Morale
traits.description: At the beginning of any Resound where there are twice as many Kadungganan than there are enemies (eg., If there are 4 Kadungganan and 2 Enemies left) all Folk enemies will Surrender, becoming Defeated.

traits.name: Heirs of the Dragon
traits.description: When a Baikhan fighter starts their riff, they and all adjacent Baikhan are ignited until the end of their next riff. All Ignited Baikhan have +1d to all Attack and Defense dice. Ignited Baikhan cannot be ignited again.

traits.name: Way Of Water
traits.description: When Ignited, their next ranged attack gains +1d and ignores blocking terrain.
